name: tutero-accounts
title: Tutero Accounts
description: Convenience commands for creating and logging into Tutero accounts.
author: zachariah-abraham

commands.name: tutero-accounts-log-in-as-teacher
commands.title: Tutero Accounts - Log in as Teacher
commands.description: Autofills the Tutero Log In Popup as a Teacher

commands.name: tutero-accounts-sign-up-as-teacher
commands.title: Tutero Accounts - Sign up as Teacher
commands.description: Autofills the Tutero Sign Up Popup as a Teacher

commands.name: tutero-accounts-sign-up-as-student
commands.title: Tutero Accounts - Sign up as Student
commands.description: Autofills the Tutero Sign Up Popup as a Student

commands.name: tutero-accounts-log-in-as-student
commands.title: Tutero Accounts - Log in as Student
commands.description: Autofills the Tutero Log In Popup as a Student

commands.name: tutero-accounts-get-last-used-email-as-teacher
commands.title: Tutero Accounts - Get Last Used Email as Teacher
commands.description: Copies the last signed up teacher email to your clipboard

commands.name: tutero-accounts-get-last-used-email-as-student
commands.title: Tutero Accounts - Get Last Used Email as Student
commands.description: Copies the last signed up student email to your clipboard
